Articles.Content: Hello there fellow kerbonauts!  First time forum poster, but I've played KSP off and on since the beta release, back when we didn't have to worry about thinks like re-entry heat or atmospheric forces (shakes old man cane at the youngin's and their dynamic pressure).  Of course, I've kept up with the game, and I figured that, since I've started playing again, I should also take the time to join up with the community on a more formal basis.
Welcome to the forum @Gunnerline, with all the new content it's a great time to start playing again.
It's good to be back!  I'm already loving the new parts.  That is, when I can find them through the myriad of mods I've added to KSP so far.
